name: Premium Editorial
description: Sophisticated magazine-style typography and layouts. Elegant serif fonts, generous whitespace, and refined visual hierarchy for content-rich experiences.

aiContext.designPhilosophy: Typography-driven design inspired by premium publications. Let content breathe with generous margins and line heights. Use restraint in decoration to maintain sophistication.
aiContext.colorGuidance: Rich, warm neutrals with subtle brown undertones. Terracotta or burgundy accents for editorial callouts. High contrast for body text readability. Muted backgrounds that complement imagery.
aiContext.componentGuidance: Prioritize reading experience with optimal line lengths (60-75 characters). Use pull quotes and drop caps for visual interest. Images should be large and impactful with proper aspect ratios. Minimal use of cards; prefer open layouts.
aiContext.accessibilityNotes: Ensure serif fonts meet readability standards at all sizes. Line height should be 1.5-1.75 for body text. Provide sufficient contrast between text and warm-toned backgrounds.
